item.description:
Exhibition of Artwork created by Germaine Gerie Krobath
and her Children and Adult Students. The artwork is from a variety of classes including watercolor, acrylic, oil and mixed media.
Everyone is welcome to come
Meet the Artists on Saturday, May 22, 2010,
from 2:00 – 5:00 pm
at the Cumberland library Hayden Center.
You will enjoy viewing the variety of styles in the paintings
that were created by Germaine’s students. You are also welcome
to view the exhibit during the month of May and June during
the Book Store hours - Thurs- 5:30pm to 7:30pm, and Sat.- 9:30am to 12:30pm

Germaine will be demonstrating the creation of a
Watercolor Painting
from start to finish on
Saturday May 22, 2010 from 3:00 – 5:00 pm,
at the Cumberland Library Hayden Center.
This is free to all, adults and children. Please contact
Germaine to register.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Art Exhibit & Watercolor Demonstration
